title: (x) What typeface is Marcelle Script based on? - Monotype Script {Stephen}
content:
Hi everybody! I found this font called Marcelle script on Dafont.com,  
I think it is inspired by an original font, do you know it?  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100705144802im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Marcelle_4028.jpg)
author: Sandrine
